Health data is personal data and is considered sensitive. It is subject to special protection under the law (European regulation on the protection of personal data - RGPD, Loi Informatique et Libertés, Code de la santé publique, etc.) in order to guarantee respect for the privacy of individuals.

properties.question: Under European regulations, how is health data classified in relation to personal data protection?
properties.option_a: As non-sensitive data that can be freely shared without consent.
properties.option_b: As sensitive data that requires special protection to respect individual privacy.
properties.option_c: As public data that is exempt from personal data protection laws.
properties.option_d: As general information that does not require any specific handling according to privacy laws.
